notes.text:
25 wins kog.
This kog had so many fellings, i used my GB deck until leg 3, where i lost 2 matches right after getting the promo, i was about to get tilted because i really wanted that 25 wins kog, it was like a challenge to me, then i decided it was time to wake the gods one last time.
The moment i changed to the para bros it was clear to me that i would win the 5 matches i needed because ninjas never failed me, so here is my tribute to this deck that gave so many wins to me, farewell.
